input_tables.name: mrr_sales_subscription
input_tables.fields: id BIGINT, sales_order_id BIGINT, customer_id BIGINT, ad_id BIGINT,stopped_at STRING, expires_at STRING, created_at STRING,backorder_id BIGINT,expired_reason STRING,remnant BOOLEAN,lock_version INT, quote_id INT, expired_by INT

input_tables.name: mrr_sales_subscription_price
input_tables.fields: subscription_id BIGINT, promo_id INT, unit_price INT, starts_on STRING, block_count INT
